name.description: A string indicating the name of the project. This name is used when building the project into a model or place file.

placeId.description: Sets the current place's place ID when connecting to the Rojo server from Roblox Studio.

gameId.description: Sets the current place's game ID when connecting to the Rojo server from Roblox Studio.

servePort.description: The port that rojo serve should listen on. Passing --port will override this setting.

serveAddress.description: If specified, this address will be used in place of the default address, as long as --address is unprovided.

servePlaceIds.description: A list of place IDs that this project may be live-synced to. This feature can help prevent overwriting the wrong game with source from Rojo.

globIgnorePaths.description: A list of globs of paths to ignore.

emitLegacyScripts.description: A boolean specifying whether Rojo should use both Script and LocalScript Instances instead of just Script Instances with their RunContext set.

tree.description: An Instance Description describing the root instance of the project.
